Others: The relationship between Jimmy Butler and the Miami Heat seems to have further deteriorated.
Jimmy Butler scored exactly nine points and played zero seconds in the fourth quarter for the second consecutive game.
Butler has not said publicly if he wants to be moved.
Heat coach Erik Spoelstra basically made Butler the point guard for parts of the third quarter in an effort to spark things.
Butler has not reached double figures in scoring in three consecutive games, the first time thatâ€™s happened since November 2013.
